about.summary: Convert Matplotlib plots into Leaflet web maps.

name: mplleaflet
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.0.5" %}

package:
  name: mplleaflet
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: mplleaflet-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/m/mplleaflet/mplleaflet-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 049e0b91797ce5b462853395138161fed9e8dfc1f4723f482ebb0739a0bbd289

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 2
  script: python -m pip install --no-deps --ignore-installed .

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python
    - jinja2
    - six
    - matplotlib

test:
  imports:
    - mplleaflet

about:
  home: https://github.com/jwass/mplleaflet
  license: BSD 3-Clause
  license_file: LICENSE.md
  summary: 'Convert Matplotlib plots into Leaflet web maps.'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jwass
    - ocefpaf
